events.name: IO Extended '17 Jakarta - Live Viewing Party

venue.name: BLOCK71 Jakarta
venue.address_1: Ariobimo Sentral, Jl. H. R. Rasuna Said No.Kav. X-2 No. 5

events.description:
Google I/O is an annual developer-focused conference held by Google in San Francisco, California. Google I/O features highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open web technologies. If you can't directly attend Google I/O, you can still feel the atmosphere at Google I/O Extended.

Join us at Google I/O Extended Jakarta!

When?

Wednesday, 17 May 2017

20:00 onwards WIB

Where?

Block 71 Jakarta

Ariobimo Sentral, Jl. H. R. Rasuna Said No.Kav. X-2 No. 5, Kuningan Tim., Kecamatan Setiabudi, Kota Jakarta Selatan (https://goo.gl/maps/oHYWEviNaZq)

Register now at http://bit.ly/GDGIO2017

Please note that we will send you a confirmation email prior to your attendance. We cannot guarantee your slot unless you get a confirmation email. We will select you based on your answer on this form.

events.name: Google I/O 2017 Jakarta Recap

venue.name: Menara by KIBAR
venue.address_1: Jl. Raden Saleh Raya no. 46A, Cikini, Menteng

events.description:
Google I/O 2017 Recap Jakarta is one day of inspirational talks and codelabs about Google's latest developer products released on recently held Google I/O 2017 at Mountain View, California. On this event, we will talk about Android O, Kotlin, Progressive Web Apps, Firebase, and more!

Date: Saturday, 22 July 2017

Time: 09.00—16.30

Venue: Jalan Raden Saleh Raya No. 46A, Cikini, Menteng, Jakarta Pusat (Maps)

Register here: bit.ly/iorecapjkt2017

This event is free, but the slots are limited.

If you are selected, we will send you a confirmation email by [masked] to confirm the available slot.

For further information: gdgindonesia.org/io17

See you!

note: You need register in herebit.ly/iorecapjkt2017 and receive confirmation email by [masked].

events.name: Indonesia All Around You: Explore Indonesia with Virtual Reality

venue.name: Menara by KIBAR
venue.address_1: Jl. Raden Saleh Raya no. 46A, Cikini, Menteng

events.description:
Google Developer Group Jakarta, in collaboration with TelusuRI, will take you to explore the ultimate combo, between Indonesia's tremendous potential in tourism and rapid developing technology of 360 virtual reality, through:

"Indonesia All Around You: Explore Indonesia with Virtual Reality."

Discover new insights around Virtual Reality (VR), as well as how to maximize VR potential to introduce Indonesian tourism to wider global audiences. Find out also how to put print media into the mix with Virtual Reality apps, through discussion on Merbabu Photobook Project, with following speakers:

• Anto Motulz - Creative Advisor, Kreavi

• Ivan Chen - CEO, Anantarupa

• Kok Bisa Channel

• Sami Kizilbash - Developer Relations Southeast Asia, Google

• Syukron - TelusuRI

• Wahyu Widhi - Founder, Landscape Indonesia

• Yudhie Fardani - Producer, DCImaji

Come and join us on:

Friday, July 28, 2017 14.00 - 17.00. MENARA by KIBAR, 2nd floorJl. Raden Saleh Raya, No.46A Cikini, Jakarta Pusat

Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/PH77J7avQbD2

This is a free event, but the seats are limited for 80 people only. 

Register now: bit.ly/gdgjktxtelusuri

For you who are selected to come, we will send a confirmation email, via [masked], by Thursday, 27 July 2017.

events.name: GDG Meetup: The Launchpad Experience

venue.name: Menara by KIBAR
venue.address_1: Jl. Raden Saleh Raya no. 46A, Cikini, Menteng

events.description:
Google Launchpad Accelerator is a six-month acceleration program for growth-stage startups from emerging markets.

Since launched last year, this program has selected more than 20 Indonesian startups that received equity-free support, 2 weeks of all-expenses-paid training at Google HQ in Silicon Valley, and access to Google’s engineers, Silicon Valley experts and the world’s top mentors. 

If you are a startup founder looking for opportunities to participate as one of the startups at Google Launchpad Accelerator program, join us for an exclusive talkshow-style discussion with:

- Joshua Yellin, Lead Program Manager for Google Launchpad Accelerator
- Rodrigo Carraresi, Startups and Developers Program Manager at Google
- Yansen Kamto, Chief Executive KIBAR
- and Google Launchpad graduates!
- Moderator: Yohan Totting, Launchpad Mentor and Developer Advocate at Google

We will discuss everything you've ever wanted to know about the Launchpad experience, including:

- What is Google Launchpad? Why should I apply?
- How do I get accepted to Google Launchpad?
- What is the experience like?
- How can I use that experience to help others in Indonesia?

Date: Monday, 16 October 2017Time: 15.00 - 17.00 (registration starts at 14.00)Place: Rombak Event Space, 2nd floor. Menara by KIBAR, Jl. Raden Saleh Raya No. 46A, Cikini, Menteng, Jakarta Pusat (maps) 

Register now only at  bit.ly/gdglaunchpad

events.name: Web Study Jam Jakarta - Mobile Site Certification (Class #1)

venue.name: Menara by KIBAR
venue.address_1: Jl. Raden Saleh Raya no. 46A, Cikini, Menteng

events.description:
• What we'll do
Want to sharpen your mobile web skills? Join our study jam to get mobile site certified!

The Mobile Sites certification is a professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate proficiency in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. A Mobile Sites certification allows individuals to demonstrate that Google recognizes them as an expert in mobile sites.

This is a chance to get a professional accreditation that demonstrates you have an understanding of basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. By learning together we think it’s going to be more fun and more of us are going to be able to complete it.

Benefits include:
• Certificate: Show that you're a certified mobile sites professional with a personalized certificate that you can print!
Get Mobile Site Certification from Google
Register only with this form
http://bit.ly/webstudyjamjkt-mobilesite
• Profile page: Share your expertise with a Google Partners public profile page that lists your certifications.

This meetup will explain the benefits of getting certified, how to get certified, and how to share and communicate your certification status with others.

• What to bring
Laptop, Water Bottle

• Important to know
Please be on time and bring identity card

Google I/O Extended 2018 - Live Viewing Party Indonesia:
What's Next from Google?

Google I/O is an annual developer-focused conference held by Google in San Francisco, California. Google I/O features highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open web technologies.

Here, we invite you to watch live session and connect with other developers at Google I/O Extended 2018 - Live Viewing Party events across Indonesia.

What to expect from Google I/O Extended?
- Exclusive talk-show with experts
- Live report straight from I/O in Mountain View
- Play the games and win Google swags
- Live streaming I/O Keynote

When?
Tuesday, 8 May 2018
8 PM - 2 AM

Where?
Menara by KIBAR
Jl. Raden Saleh Raya No.46A, RT.1/RW.2, Cikini, Menteng, Kota Jakarta Pusat, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 10330

Google I/O Extended 2018 - Recap Jakarta
Supported by GO-JEK

Google I/O is an annual developer-focused conference held by Google in San Francisco, California. Google I/O features highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open web technologies.

In Google I/O Extended 2018 Recap Jakarta, we will have discussions from all range of topics; such as What's new for Web Technologies, What's new for Android, Material Theming, and Google Developer Startup Program from the experts in the field.

Here, we invite you to connect with other developers at Google I/O Extended 2018 - Recap events across Indonesia.

What to expect from Google I/O Extended?
- Exclusive talk-show with experts
- Play the games and win Google swags

Here are our awesome speakers:
1. Yohan Totting (Developer Advocate, Google)
2. Andrew Kurniadi (GDE, Android)
3. Josh Adi Tedjasaputra (GDE, Product Design)
4. Wito Chandra (Product Engineer, GO-JEK)
5. Casper (Co-founder, Kulina)
6. Leonika Sari (CEO, Reblood)

events.name: Codelabs ARCore - Google I/O Extended 2018 - Recap Jakarta

venue.name: Ruang & Tempo
venue.address_1: Jalan Palmerah Barat No. 8

events.description:
Form Registration: http://bit.ly/arcore-codelabjkt

Codelabs ARCore - Google I/O Extended 2018 - Recap Jakarta

Google I/O is an annual developer-focused conference held by Google in San Francisco, California. Google I/O features highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open web technologies.

When?
Sunday, 22 July 2018
1.00 PM - 5.00 PM

Where?
Ruang & Tempo, Gedung Tempo Lantai 8. Jalan Palmerah Barat No. 8, RT.3/RW.5, Grogol Utara, Kby. Lama, Kota Jakarta Selatan, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 11480

Register here: http://bit.ly/arcore-codelabjkt

more info: https://developers.google.com/ar/discover/

---------------

1. Overview
ARCore is a platform for building augmented reality apps on Android. ARCore uses three key technologies to integrate virtual content with the real world as seen through your phone's camera:

- Motion tracking allows the phone to understand and track its position relative to the world.
- Environmental understanding allows the phone to detect the size and location of flat horizontal surfaces like the ground or a coffee table.
- Light estimation allows the phone to estimate the environment's current lighting conditions.

This codelab guides you through building a simple demo game to introduce these capabilities so you can use them in your own applications.

2. What you'll learn
- Enabling ARCore through the Player settings
- Adding the ARCore SDK prefabs to the scene
- Scaling objects consistently to look reasonable with respect to the real world.
- Using Anchors to place objects at a fixed location relative to the real world.
- Using detected planes as the foundation of augmented reality objects
- Using touch and gaze input to interact with the ARCore scene
Prerequisites
- Make sure you have these before starting the codelab:

Unity Game Engine
- Recommended version: Unity[masked] LTS or later
- Minimum version:[masked]f2
- JDK 8 (JDK 9 is currently not supported by Unity, use JDK 8 instead)

ARCore SDK for Unity
- Recommended version: v1.2.0 or later (arcore-unity-sdk-v1.2.0.unitypackage)
- Minimum version: v1.0.0
Other items
- Sample assets for the project (arcore-intro.unitypackage, hosted on GitHub)
- ARCore supported device and USB cable

More information about getting started can be found at: developers.google.com/ar/develop/unity/getting-started

Now that you have everything you need, let's start!

events.description:
Only register in this form: http://bit.ly/flutter-jkt

Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

Want to get started on building Flutter apps?

Join us for our Flutter Study Jam! Together we'll work through Flutter Udacity Course (https://www.udacity.com/course/build-native-mobile-apps-with-flutter--ud905). You will be able to get hands-on experience with Flutter and build a Flutter app while learning the fundamentals.

Saturday, 11 August 2018 (10.00 - 16.00 WIB)
* Introduce Flutter.io
* How to installation Flutter
* Hello World on Flutter
* Create Style, Text and Icon, Image, etc about (Widget)
* AppBar
* Manage Layout on Flutter
* Card & Parsing Data on Flutter
* Navigation, Routes Page Flutter
* TabBar and TabView on Flutter
* ListView & Demo ListView from JSON

Sunday, 12 August 2018 (10.00 - 16.00 WIB)
* Firebase Auth (Google Sign In)
* Firebase CRUD on Flutter

Bring a laptop! The course will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, the laptop should have Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam to save time. Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine.

Check out : https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

Requirement Workshop :
1. Windows :
* Operating Systems: Windows 7 SP1 or later (64-bit)
* Disk Space: 400 MB (does not include disk space for IDE/tools).
* Tools: Flutter depends on these tools being available in your environment.
- PowerShell 5.0 or newer
- Git for Windows (with the “Use Git from the Windows Command Prompt” option)

If Git for Windows is already installed, make sure you can run git commands from the Command Prompt or PowerShell.

2. MacOS:
* Operating Systems: macOS (64-bit)
* Disk Space: 700 MB (does not include disk space for IDE/tools).
* Tools: Flutter depends on these command-line tools being available in your environment.
- bash, mkdir, rm, git, curl, unzip, which

Requirement Knowledge and Tools :
1. Understanding Programming Basic Android with Java or Kotlin
2. Laptop
3. Android Studio or Visual Studio Code
4. Smartphone or Emulator for Android or IOS

events.name: Google Cloud Platform & Docker Workshop For Beginner (Free Workshop/Labs)

venue.name: Menara by KIBAR
venue.address_1: Jl. Raden Saleh Raya no. 46A, Cikini, Menteng

events.description:
GDG Jakarta x DockerID present:
Google Cloud Platform & Docker Workshop For Beginner

THIS IS A FREE EVENT - PLEASE FINISH YOUR RSVP IN THE LINK BELOW
https://events.docker.com/events/details/docker-jakarta-presents-docker-workshop-for-beginner-free-workshoplabs

====================PLEASE READ THIS==================
Only register in this form: https://goo.gl/forms/kQcoH7CiW8oQfvHA2

RSVP on this page only will not guarantee that you get the ticket to the workshop.

====================================================

Docker is a computer program that performs operating-system-level virtualization also known as containerization. It was first released in 2013 and is developed by Docker, Inc. Docker nowadays is widely used to deploy applications in massive scale in many big companies within the country and overseas.

Want to get started on deploying your application with Docker?

Join us for Docker Workshop! Together we'll work through play-with-docker (https://labs.play-with-docker.com/) and see how Dockerized application can be deployed to container orchestrator engine, like Kubernetes. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker and build your application running in a container.

WARN: THIS EVENT IS FOR BEGINNER. SO IF YOU ARE THINKING THAT YOU ARE AN EXPERT OR ALREADY KNOW DOCKER, YOU CAN SKIP THIS EVENT.

Saturday, 1 September 2018 (10.00 - 15.00 WIB)

* Docker 101
* Play With Docker Labs
* Create Running Container of Simple Web Apps
* Docker deployment with K8s

Presenter:
Imre Nagi (Docker Community Leader & Software Engineer @Data Traveloka
Aditya Hilman (System Architect Engineer @ Bridestory)

========================IMPORTANT NOTES=================

Bring a laptop! The workshop will run on web browser and your favorit shell. For the best experience, the laptop should have Docker installed on it prior to starting the Docker workshop to save time. Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine.

Checkout : https://docs.docker.com/install/

Requirement Workshop :
* Docker application is installed. Please make sure the installation is completed successfully by running `docker` command in your shell.
* Laptop (Windows, Linux, MacOS)

Requirement Knowledge and Tools :
1. Basic shell command
2. Laptop
3. Text Editor (SublimeText, Atom, Notepad++, etc)

This workshop is brought by Docker Community Leader Chapter Indonesia and GDG Jakarta

---

Hosted By
Imre Nagi, Community Leader

---

THIS IS A FREE EVENT - PLEASE FINISH YOUR RSVP IN THE LINK BELOW
https://events.docker.com/events/details/docker-jakarta-presents-docker-workshop-for-beginner-free-workshoplabs

Seats are limited! Only who get email confirmation can attend in this event.

events.name: Next 18 Extended - Jakarta

venue.name: Ruang & Tempo
venue.address_1: Jalan Palmerah Barat No. 8

events.description:
REGISTER HERE: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScBBk2exc804jKkU_kavaQiuMTwiy-9k5YpLpUo8A5vxten8w/viewform

The Google Cloud Next '18 conference just concluded in San Francisco (from Jul 24-27) bringing together experts, partners and customers of Google Cloud products to share ideas and make the cloud stronger and more productive for everyone.

The "Next 18 Extended" events bring those ideas and experience to communities with local events that cover key announcements and provide hands-on learning opportunities. The Google Developer Group Jakarta is holding Next 18 Extended event as described below.

- Deep Learning with Tensorflow for Developer (Afif Akbar Iskandar, AI Scientist @ Bukalapak)
- Firebase ML Kit (Zulwiyoza Putra, Software Engineer @ Bataphia)

Join us for a recap of key announcements and tech deep dives from Google Cloud Next 18, with tech talks from experts and attendees.

events.name: GDG DevFest 2018 - Jakarta (Conference)

venue.name: Kedasi Space Auditorium
venue.address_1: Kedasi Space Auditorium
venue.address_2: Graha Niaga Thamrin Lvl 6, KH. Mas Mansyur, Kebon Melati, Tanah Abang, Central Jakarta 10230

events.description:
DevFests are community-led, developer events hosted by GDG chapters around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. Each DevFest is inspired by and uniquely tailored to the needs of the developer community and region that hosts it.

We have crafted talks and codelabs all about Android, Web, Cloud, and Google latest technology from the experts.

Date: Thursday, November 29, 2018
Time: 12.30 - 18.00 WIB
Place: Kedasi Auditorium,
Graha Niaga Thamrin Level 6, Kebon Kacang, Jl. K.H. Mas Mansyur, RT.2/RW.8, Kb. Melati, Tanah Abang, Kota Jakarta Pusat, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 10230

Agenda:
12:30 - 13:00 Registration
13:00 - 13:10 Event Start
13:10 - 13:20 Opening & Recap GDG Jakarta 2018
13:20 - 13:50 Stand Out on Google Search with Structured Data
Speaker: Mahmud Omar Saladin (Search Advocate, Webmaster Relations, Google)
13:50 - 14:20 What's new on the web
Speaker: Yohan Totting (Web Developer Advocate, Google)
14:20 - 14:50 Machine Learning with TensorflowJS
Speaker: Riza Fahmi (GDE, Web Technologies)
14:50 - 15:20 The Journey of Craftmanship - Kotlin in Action
Speaker: Raditya Gumay (Software Engineer, GO-JEK)
15:20 - 15:50 Let's talk Devops
Speaker: Denny Muktar (Cloud, Google)
15:50 - 16:20 Technical Overview of Kubernetes
Speaker: Giri Kuncoro (Software Engineer, GO-JEK)
16:20 - 16:50 Serverless Cloud Function and Google Cloud Vision API
Speaker: Imre Nagi (Data Engineer, Traveloka)
16:50 - 17:30 Closing & Networking

ONLY REGISTER HERE: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScFHVC4rE83FOAJJC0DHPSuudYMGddnNxdRuu5RfKFq6iFa2Q/viewform

After you register, we will send you a confirmation email prior to your attendance via [masked] by 27 November 2018. We cannot guarantee your slot unless you get a confirmation email.

Thanks and see you!

events.description:

Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

* Firebase Auth (Google Sign In)

- Basic widget
- SDK flutter stable version

events.description:

GDG Jakarta invites you to join on a meetup about Cloud Dataflow.

This meetup will discuss about the basic feature of Cloud Dataflow and how to use windowing and triggering features in Cloud Dataflow to make an accurate real streaming analytics.

Imre Nagi (Data Engineer, Traveloka)

The event will be held on:

Thursday, 31 Jan 2019

Venue
Synrgy Accelerator
Manhattan Square, Mezanine Floor
Jalan TB Simatupang No Kav. 1S, Cilandak Timur, Jakarta

venue.name: Menara by KIBAR
venue.address_1: Jl. Raden Saleh Raya no. 46A, Cikini, Menteng

events.description:
Please only register in here
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSefmEjEJcNtXQNZDpR-LfBjY8u1eMN5MoAznVW9jDAHVXAseg/viewform
-----------------------------------------------------------

Get hands on workshop with Google Cloud technologies. You will learn the fundamental tools and capabilities of Google Cloud.

This event will be held on (You only need to join 1 session only)
- Saturday, 6 April 2019 (09.30 - 15.00 WIB) - Baseline : Data, ML, AI
- Sunday, 7 April 2019 (09.30 - 15.00 WIB) - Baseline : Data, ML, AI

There are several benefits for the participant such as:
- Free access to Qwiklabs hands-on labs, a $55+ value
- Earn Google Cloud badges to show your skills and expertise

What to bring to the event:
Laptop -- Mac, PC, Chromebook, Linux, everyone’s welcome.
Laptop charger.
The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, use Firefox or Chrome.

Register now! Seats are limited
